CHAT.comment: CARLOS JIMENEZ, Petitioner v. NATHANIEL QUARTERMAN, DIRECTOR, TEXAS DEPARTMENT OF CRIMINAL JUSTICE, CORRECTIONAL INSTITUTIONS DIVISION.
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 12:59 p.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF THOMAS C. GOLDSTEIN ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
ORAL ARGUMENT OF SEAN D. JORDAN ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENT
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF THOMAS C. GOLDSTEIN ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
(Whereupon, at 1:58 p.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
